articles.content: LONDON European stocks were mostly higher Thursday morning, as markets react to positive momentum stateside following the final approval of President Joe Biden's $1.9 trillion Covid relief bill.

articles.title: European markets head for higher open after approval of U.S. Covid stimulus - CNBC
